tool_description: Dead simple crypto price in USD
name: Minimalist Live Crypto Price USD
title: Minimalist Live Crypto Price USD

api_list.name: Cardano
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://minimalist-live-crypto-price-usd.p.rapidapi.com/api/price/cardano"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "minimalist-live-crypto-price-usd.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
